name: Vibhav Gogate
content: Vibhav Gogate Home Papers Software Courses Research Tutorials Contact CV UAI 14 Competition UAI 16 Evaluation Vibhav Gogate Professor Co-director, The Center for Machine Learning Department of Computer Science The University of Texas at Dallas Research Interests: Machine (Deep) learning and Artificial Intelligence Current Research Focus: Probabilistic Graphical Models, Statistical Relational Learning, Combining Deep Learning and Graphical Models. Current Research Funding: NSF and DARPA (PI on XAI and PTG programs)
